visualobjects

Class VisualAssociation

  • java.lang.Object
    • visualobjects.VisualObject<Association>
      • visualobjects.VisualAssociation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsciiTypable, FunctionTypable, Typable, DeleteListener, DeleteSubject, UpdateListener, Editable

    public class VisualAssociation
extends VisualObject<Association>
implements UpdateListener, Editable
    The visualization of a logical association
